    • upcomingAppointmentStatus

      private void upcomingAppointmentStatus()
      Checks the schedule for appointments starting within 15 minutes of current system time. Displays an alert regarding the status of upcoming appointments.

    • getDateRange

      private void getDateRange(javafx.event.Event event)
      Updates appointment table view based on the selected date range.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by the selection change.

    • getContactReport

      public void getContactReport()
      Retrieves the contact report based on the selected contact. Uses a lambda expression predicate in the forEach method for concise code. The lambda expression adds the appointment to the byContact list if it meets the requirements of the conditional.

    • getCustomerReport

      public void getCustomerReport()
      Retrieves the customer report based on the selected customer. Uses a lambda expression predicate in the forEach method for concise code. The lambda expression adds the appointment to the byCustomer list if it meets the requirements of the conditional.

    • getMonthTypeReport

      public void getMonthTypeReport()
      Retrieves and displays the Month Type Report data based on the selected type and month.

    • onLogOutClick

      public void onLogOutClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Logs out and switches to the log in form. Uses lambda expressions to concisely implement EventHandler interface for window dragging.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs loading the log in form.

    • onAddAppointmentClick

      public void onAddAppointmentClick() throws IOException
      Opens the appointment form to add a new appointment.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs loading the appointment form.

    • onEditAppointmentClick

      public void onEditAppointmentClick() throws IOException
      Opens the appointment form to edit the selected appointment.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs loading the appointment form.

    • onDeleteAppointmentClick

      public void onDeleteAppointmentClick()
      Deletes the selected appointment.

    • onDeleteCustomerClick
